Types

Chunk ¶
Source

Chunk :: struct {
	allocated: i32,
	abuf:      [^]u8,
	alen:      u32,
	volume:    u8,
}

EffectDone_t ¶
Source

EffectDone_t :: proc "cdecl" (jid: i32, pointer: rawptr)

EffectFunc_t ¶
Source

EffectFunc_t :: proc "cdecl" (chan: i32, stream: rawptr, len: i32, udata: rawptr)

Fading ¶
Source

Fading :: enum i32 {
	NO_FADING, 
	FADING_OUT, 
	FADING_IN, 
}

InitFlag ¶
Source

InitFlag :: enum i32 {
	FLAC = 0, 
	MOD  = 1, 
	MP3  = 3, 
	OGG  = 4, 
	MID  = 5, 
	OPUS = 6, 
}

InitFlags ¶
Source

InitFlags :: distinct bit_set[InitFlag; i32]

MixFunc ¶
Source

MixFunc :: proc "cdecl" (userdata: rawptr, stream: [^]u8, len: i32)

Music ¶
Source

Music :: struct {}

MusicType ¶
Source

MusicType :: enum i32 {
	NONE, 
	CMD, 
	WAV, 
	MOD, 
	MID, 
	OGG, 
	MP3, 
	MP3_MAD_UNUSED, 
	FLAC, 
	MODPLUG_UNUSED, 
	OPUS, 
}
